tool_description: Mojitok Emoticons API provides stickers, emojis and gifs based on the text which users submit.
name: mojitok Stickers
title: Mojitok Emoticons

api_list.name: package
api_list.description: Provides a list of mojitok emoticons packages.

optional_parameters.name: language
optional_parameters.description: Provides a list of mojitok emoticons packages.

api_list.name: emoticons
api_list.description: When you type a message, it suggests a list of emoticons to match emotions or situations.

required_parameters.name: text
required_parameters.description: The text you want to convert to an emoticon. For Unicode, must be URL encoded.

optional_parameters.name: language
optional_parameters.description: Sets the language for the returned result value. It provides en(English), ja(Japanese), zh(Chinese), vi(Vietnamese) andko(Korean), and is treated as ko if no value is specified or if it is not correct.

optional_parameters.name: list
optional_parameters.description: Supports up to 1000 list per page.
